column4: I just installed a fresh gutsy system. But it is running only 800x600 and wont do anything higher. I have a nvidia 6600gt. Restricted drivers management shows that an nvidia driver is installed and enabled, but it doesnt seem to be. Help!

I just installed a fresh gutsy system. But it is running only 800x600 and wont do anything higher. I have a nvidia 6600gt. Restricted drivers management shows that an nvidia driver is installed and enabled, but it doesnt seem to be. Help!
